div.pre: 999 Kozyrka-Bogdanovka region, just N of Parutino, Ochakov raion, Nikolaev Oblast, Ukraine, 1867 Burial: c. 450 B.C. (Karyszkowski) Contents: c. 100 AE Olbia: aes grave (as AMNG I.1, pl. 8, 3) Disposition: dispersed â€ Liutsenko (letter from P. Burachkov) Zograph, p. 123, note 4
